Text: You HAVE to include the imdb link, that is the minimum you NEED to do.

We're living in a high speed society, so please; we're not stupid or lazy, but hell one little link? just the imdb...always...please?

Thanks to marcus for supplying us with it this time, and still thanks for upload :)
Totaly boring movie with a plot that could be dated 10 years back. Jamie Barlett plays so badly, his role of a cool old grumbling avenger that it is hard not to fall asleep. But thanks for sharing!
